GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of a specific article using the article_id as en endpoint

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id, using the comments as en endpoint

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to a specific article_id takes a request of username and body

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an object of a specific article using the article_id as en endpoint

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment which is identified by the comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of specific user

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates an object of a specific comment using the comment_id as en endpoint
